events.name: OneService Innovation Challenge 2018: Content Workshop
events.description:
The OneService Innovation Challenge 2018 (31 Aug - 2 Sep), organised by the Municipal Services Office (MSO) invites passionate innovators to co-create new services for the revamped OneService App, which will be a one-stop multi-functional platform aimed at fulfilling the municipal needs of neighbourhoods across Singapore.
To find out how you can get involved and help strengthen Singapore's neighbourhoods, join us at the Content Workshop (23 Aug). This Workshop is designed to be a primer for the OneService Innovation Challenge 2018.
Get introduced to the revamped OneService digital products and their roadmap for the future. Delve into the challenge statements of this Challenge along with industry experts and uncover where you can develop new services! Finally, get your creative juices flowing in a design thinking-inspired ideation exercise!

Programme
- Introduction to Municipal Services Office (MSO)
- OneService digital ecosystem, product roadmap
- Introduction to OSIC challenge statements
- Introduction to government digital services - GovTech
- Introduction to OneMap - SLA
- NTUC FairPrice's omni-channel digital transformation - NTUC FairPrice
- Moving Communities: Helping communities move through mobility solutions - MVLChain (the company behind new ride-hailing app, 'TADA')
- What to expect at OSIC 2018
- Ideation Exercise: observations-insights-ideas

Learn more about the OneService Innovation Challenge 2018, especially the challenge statements, here.
We're organising more workshops to equip you with useful tools and resources to use at the Challenge weekend. Visit our Events page to learn more about these workshops and register for the OneService Innovation Challenge 2018.

If you have any questions, please send us an email at hello@upsingapore.com. 
- Introduction to Municipal Services Office (MSO) - Mohamed Hardi, Deputy Director, Programmes, MSO- OneService digital ecosystem, product roadmap, and OSIC challenge statements - Adrian Tan, Assistant Director (OneService Digital Products), Programmes, MSO- Introduction to government digital services - Ti Jie Bo, Associate Consultant, Product Design & Development, Goverment Digital Services, GovTech- Introduction to OneMap - Justin Chua, Assistant Manager, GeoSpatial System & Technology, SLA- NTUC FairPrice's omni-channel digital transformation - Elvin Too, Chief Omnichannel Officer and General Manager, Online, NTUC FairPrice- Moving Communities: Helping communities move through mobility solutions - Kay Woo, Founder, MVLChain (the company behind new ride-hailing app, 'TADA')- What to expect at OSIC 2018- Ideation Exercise: observations-insights-ideas
events.location: LEVEL3, Mapletree Business City, 20 Pasir Panjang Road, #03-22/24, Singapore 117439
